commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
Strategy Order Limit Order SL Order SquareOff position Cancel Order
Script Type*
Selected Type *
Script *
    Premium *
    Premium can't be negative.
    Max Variation *
    Max variation can't be less than 10.
    ATM Gap *

    Expiry type *

    Quantity *
    Quantity must be greater than 0.

    Price can't be negative.
    Price *
    Trigger Price can't be negative.
